text: Xindao de renmen a! Jin yi sharen zhe dizui wei nimen de dingzhi, gongmin dichang gongmin, nuli dichang nuli, funu dichang funu. Ruguo shi qin you suo kuan she, name, yifang ying yi li tichu yaoqiu, yifang ying yi li jiyu peichang, zhe shi nimen de zhu suo jiang shi de jianqing he ci'en. Shihou, guo fen de ren, jiang shou tongku de xingfa
